name: Turbohire
description: Turbohire are a recruitment automation platform and hiring best friend of your recruitment process. No, we are not a recruitment agency. The platform that TurboHire has built helps you optimize your recruitment process. How? It centralizes the entire process from Job requisition to offer letter release while giving you at max flexibility to customize the workflows. Other than this TurboHumans work hard and party harder.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
sub_categories: Software and Services Related to HR Software
Headline: Recruitment Automation Platform
ShortDescription: TurboHire is an AI-Powered Recruitment Experiences to integrate on HRMS/ WFM for Enterprises.

Highlights.name: High Volume Hiring
Highlights.description: Set up a high-volume recruitment strategy with TurboHire scaling from job requisition to offer letters in a single destination.

Highlights.name: Hyper Growth Hiring
Highlights.description: Scale your team from within in a short span of time across all verticals with TurboHire’s intelligent and automated solutions and see the magic for yourself.

Highlights.name: Employer Branding
Highlights.description: Build a strong employer brand for your company by using AI-powered careers pages and rich communication tools and let TurboHire optimize candidate experience.

enhanced_description: Turbohire is an AI-powered recruitment automation platform designed to optimize and centralize the entire hiring process, from job requisition to offer letter release. It offers features like outbound recruiting, AI-driven candidate scoring and talent screening, and automated interview scheduling. The platform provides flexibility to customize workflows and supports high-volume and hyper-growth hiring strategies. It also helps build a strong employer brand through AI-powered career pages and rich communication tools, aiming to optimize the candidate experience. TurboHire is built for enterprises and designed to integrate with existing HRMS/WFM systems.
competitive_advantages: End-to-end recruitment process centralization (from job requisition to offer letter)
Automated candidate screening and interview scheduling
Support for high-volume and hyper-growth hiring
Tools for employer branding and candidate experience optimization
implementation_scenarios: Integration with existing Workforce Management (WFM) systems
